title: DAISS: Sovereign AI Protocol â€” Core Conceptual Node
description: The Sovereign AI Protocol is a conceptual node within DAISS (Strategic Intelligence Operating System). This working paper outlines the structural principles behind sovereign AI architectures, focusing on autonomy, interpretability, and distributed decision-making. It functions as a foundational analytical document within a broader research and publication framework, and is not the book itself.
notes: This DOI represents one conceptual node within the DAISS Seed Matrix, a series of independent technical notes establishing the structural foundations for a forthcoming consolidated volume.
